name: Shinobi Bad Buddies
description: Shinobi Bad Buddies will reveal the mischievous ninja in you, as you make your way through the story and the co-op missions or challenge your friends into a local battle!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10 Processor: Intel core i3 6006U 2Ghz two cores Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 520 Storage: 850 MB available space
